name: 家的钥匙 / IenoKagi
description:
StoryHiroshi Kuroyanagi, a boorish failure of an elementary school teacher, is blackmailed by his student Rika Sakuma, a girl with demonic intelligence, into a wild scheme to rob the school of a hidden fortune worth tens of millions of yen.
 
Lies, cheating, and betrayal...students and teachers struggle against one another for dominance in this suspenseful thriller visual novel.
 
Who will come out on top and claim the schools hidden fortune?Features
  • Narrative based visual novel game.
  • 50667 words of total text.
  • Fully voiced female characters (Japanese)
  • Cute heroines each with their own unique personalities.
